azurerm_security_center_subscription_pri.description: Manages the Pricing Tier for Azure Security Center in the current subscription.

tier.description: The pricing tier to use. Possible values are `Free` and `Standard`.

create.description: Used when creating the Security Center Subscription Pricing.

update.description: Used when updating the Security Center Subscription Pricing.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Security Center Subscription Pricing.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Security Center Subscription Pricing.
